results.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the accounts of a business that show how successful it has been over a period of time, usually a year
results.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: British Airways has announced disappointing results for the first half of the year.
results.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the profit or loss made by a company in a particular period of time, or a report it gives about this
results.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The company’s first full-year results showed sales of $2.46 billion.
Two British banks announced management changes after announcing poor financial results.
The bank’s strongoperating results boosted its stock price.
results.translation[1].definitions[1].de: things that happen successfully because of someone’s efforts, plans etc
results.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: I knew the sales force couldachieve results despite the difficulties.
A wide range of financial incentives is likely toproduce the best results.
